Description.value: With an already restricted FOV the added restriction on the NV Goggles just felt too much. By combining these 2 filter sets I was able to get a faded feel for nightvision without the goggle blockage but retain a bit of color. I know there are several mods that use the Bright effect as an alternative to the NightVision effect but I felt that made it too much like daytime so added the VibrantDeSat to dull the colors some.
